name: Rolls Royce Phantom
about: Sublime. A luxury car not so much at the top of the heap as set apart from it.

name: Ferrari 458
about: There is nothing to fault. Time spent with this car is time spent with your mouth open and brain readjusting.

name: VW Golf GTI
about: There's no other car that does quite so much, quite so well

name: Porsche Boxster
about: Driving position? Perfect. Engine? Perfect. Brakes? Perfect. Gearbox? Perfect. Handling? Perfect.

name: BMW 320d
about: The best performing, best handling exec car. Justifiable with head and heart.

name: Ford Focus
about: Proof a 5dr hatch can be not just a commodity, but something you enjoy and desire..

name: Porsche 911 993
about: It may have started out as little more than a sporty VW Beetle, but it is now the most complete car on earth.

name: Renault Clio Williams
about: A monster, a proper angry little hot hatch that, in so many ways, defines the genre

name: Lexus LFA
about: Expensive, over-specified and looks like an evil transformer. The greatest Japanese car? Maybe.

name: Toyota Prius
about: Like a rolling interactive energy-conservation video game. Somehow magical for a vegan's car.

name: Mini Cooper
about: Not only a design icon, but a car that makes driving feel like a completely natural activity.

name: Nissan GT-R
about: In short, it's extraordinary. One of the fastest cars ever made, and one of the best we've driven..

name: Ford Fiesta ST
about: A blue-collar hero. Every control just sends tingling little signals to your fingertips.

name: Mitsubishi Evo VI Makinen
about: Fast and completely confidence-inspiring. On real-world roads, there's simply nothing quicker..

name: Subaru Impreza P1
about: Feels like you're attached to some hybrid Lawrence Dallaglio/Linford Christie creation as it rockets you across backroads.

name: Pagani Zonda
about: Incredible. There's no production car that can touch it for power, speed, excitement or indeed expense.

name: Ariel Atom
about: That a miniscule maker has built something on a par with blue-chip supercars is incredible.

name: Range Rover
about: The RR can cope with anything. Now more than ever, this is an all-terrain Bentley.

name: Lamborghini Murcielago LP-670SV
about: Everything a supercar should be: expensive, exclusive, mesmerising and ludicrously, lethally fast

name: Honda S2000
about: One of the most exciting roadsters. You can't appreciate how manic it feels until you're bouncing off the limiter..

name: Toyota Hilux
about: The most indestructible car in the world. When the machines eventually rise up, you know what they'll be driving..

name: Audi A2
about: If you've the slightest eye for design, you can't help but be wooed by the A2, the most exotic hatch in town.

name: Bentley Continental GT
about: If you want something to take you and three others across continents, there's nothing better on the planet.

name: Audi TT
about: The TT looks stunning. It's quite clearly one of the best-looking cars in the world.

name: Mercedes-Benz S-Class
about: When you climb aboard, you realise this is the centre of all things Benz; everything filters down from here..

name: Land Rover Discovery
about: Deals with muck and mountains better than any LR before, drives better on-road than any SUV.

name: Fiat 500
about: More than a revival, more than a cash-in. It's a small car that prevents you from longing for a bigger one, a car with soul in spades..

name: McLaren 12C Spider
about: It's like Ron's army took a look at the laws of physics, ummed and said: ‘Yeah, let's not worry about those...

name: Aston Martin V12 Vantage
about: Strikes the perfect balance between power and control. It's probably the best car Aston's ever built.

name: Ferrari Enzo
about: It requires your brain and eyes to operate at superhuman levels. You pretty much need to be able to time-travel..

name: Porsche Carrera GT
about: An all-time great. An object lesson in engineering to rival the Brooklyn Bridge.

name: Lotus Elise
about: Something to be taken out, savoured then popped away until next time

name: BMW 5-Series E39
about: A rare combination of sportiness and refinement, like two cars in one...

name: Lancia Delta Integrale Evo III
about: A grunty, grippy thing that snouts about the place looking for corners

name: Ferrari 550
about: You lounge in a sea of power, leathery luxury and Italian magnificence...

name: Toyota GT86
about: It's come barrelling in with a big, dirty smile. It's designed for one thing: fun.

name: Mercedes-Benz CLK Black
about: A car that achieves the impossible. It could get you to Beijing or bite chunks out of a 911 Turbo on a Welsh B-road.

name: Jaguar F-Type V6S
about: Sharp and invigorating and full of life and charisma.

name: Fiat Multipla
about: What else drives so sweetly and is as roomy as a Pickfords van?.

name: Ford GT
about: Burdened with an impossibly glamorous heritage, this is the lowest, sleekest, most staggeringly handsome supercar since the original GT40.

name: Alfa Romeo 8C Spider
about: You're looking at it, and a few seconds later you're thinking of re-mortgaging your home, selling a kidney, robbing a bank...

name: Mazda MX-5
about: The art is in the travelling, the science in the getting there. Only the MX-5 seems to understand that.

name: Ferrari FF
about: The most un-Ferrari of modern times, but also a stroke of genius.

name: Bugatti Veyron
about: Nothing prepares you for the shock of the acceleration when you open the throttle and unleash a thousand horses..

name: BMW X5
about: Its combination of poise and precision would shame many saloons, let alone other 4x4s..

name: Honda Integra Type R
about: There's an overwhelming sense that this car was built to be brutally caned.

name: Lamborghini Gallardo
about: Lambo has always produced great-looking machines, but here 40 years of epic potential has finally been fulfilled.

name: Dacia Duster
about: The Duster distills the very essence of motoring. No car in the world offers more freedom for your quid..

name: Vauxhall Ampera
about: An EV without the range anxiety. A green car without the sense of self-righteous anger..

name: Audi RS2
about: An estate car that out-performs pretty much everything on the road.
